text:
'I have been coming here regularly for  almost two years. One of my favorite places to grab a coffee and relax. The staff is very very friendly and professional and the mochas are the best I have had (both hot and iced).

I stopped going here for a bit because I left the area due to COVID. It was one of the places I went to first when I was looking for normalcy. The inside is spaced out well enough that I feel good about sitting inside.

Very grateful to have GFG in my neighborhood.'

author: Samantha Cagman
text: 'After ordering from GFG on Door Dash yesterday and my partner and I enjoying the savory breakfast
column5: I placed an order again today. When my driver arrived for pickup he called to tell me they werenâ€™t accepting orders
column6: so I called to speak with the manager. The manager told me they â€œwerenâ€™t on Door Dash for 6 months because they were losing moneyâ€
column8: I ordered and received that order via the same app just yesterday. Sir
column10: youâ€™ve been losing money because youâ€™re in a location dominated by office buildings and for 6 months no one has been at work. If anything
column11: itâ€™s people like me in Jersey City spending $25 on breakfast via delivery that have KEPT you in business the last 6 months. Once Iâ€™m back at work
column12: you can be sure Iâ€™ll no longer be getting my breakfast from GFG. Check out Prato Bakery or even Panera for breakfast instead of wasting your unappreciated money here.'

author: Tiffany Ann
text: "I really wish I could say I like this place but I cant\nwe have gone there numerous times after seeing posts on Instagram that look delicious.  Unfortunately for us. The taste isnt there. After having been to Greece I cant say this is greek from Greece. The flavor is bland and doesn't scream authentic greek. It looks amazing and photographs beautifully but doesn't taste like that. When spending this kind of money I would expect better. They have a great vibe going in the restaurant. Everything else is 5 star except the most important. Dont bother ordering the frappe here it is entirely too strong and not even made correctly."
